title: (x) Club Paris - Times, various {Franz, Patricia}
content: CLUB looks a lot like Times Bold. Sorry, no time for the other one right now
author: franz

comments.content: PARIS looks custom, because of inconsistencies in how it's drawn. There are a lot of handtooled fonts like Goudy, Caslon, Castellar, Mona Lisa, etc. that can give you this sort of look.

I agree PARIS looks custom. It might have started as Narcissus. The A looks the same:   
   
 [http://www.identifont.com/show?8NG](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516143138/http:/www.identifont.com/show?8NG)
